content: May 3 (Reuters) - Pandora A/S CEO in interview with Reuters:

* PANDORA CEO: WE HAVEN'T TOUCHED THE UPPER END OF THE GUIDANCE, THERE'S STILL A FAIR AMOUNT OF UNCERTAINTY OUT THERE* PANDORA CEO: TRAFFIC IN STORES IS UP 3% YOY, BASKET SIZE IS FLAT* PANDORA CEO: ON TRAFFIC VOLUME IN CHINA: WE STILL HAVE A LONG WAY TO GO BEFORE WE REACH PRE-PANDEMIC LEVELS* PANDORA CEO: BRAND RELAUNCH IN CHINESE CITIES WILL PROBABLY BE SEQUENTIAL INSTEAD OF FIVE CITIES IN ONE GO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Nikolaj Skydsgaard)
